# Why use Tailwind - use `npx create-next-app@latest` to generate a [nextjs](https://nextjs.org) app - open the folder in your code editor and run npm run dev ```html:index.html

Hello World

``` # Understanding package in Golang{" "} The concept of packages in [golang](http://go.dev) has been a big pain to me as a newbie but to my suprise its really easy ```go:main.go showLineNumbers package main import("fmt"); func main (){ fmt.Println("Hello World") } ```

body.raw:
> Next.js has two forms of pre-rendering: [**Static Generation**](http://next.org) and **Server-side Rendering**. The difference is in **when** it generates the HTML for a page.

## Understanding channels in golang

- consider a channel to be a tunnel which helps in passing data between processes
- Channels enables us to communicate between goroutnies

## Buffered vs Unbuffered channels

```go:main.go showLineNumbers
package main

import (
  "fmt"
  "time"
)

func main () {
    start:= time.Now()
    resp:= make(chan any,2)

    go fetchPosts(resp chan any)
    go fetchUserLikes(resp chan any)

    for data:=range resp {
       fmt.Println("response:  ",data)
    }
    fmt.Println("took: ",time.Since(start))
}

```

## Why i transitioned to Typescript and why you should too!

- **Typescript** - provides its retrictions and helps to identify bugs during development of your app.
- **Security** -Why you should use TypeScript over [JavaScript](http://vitejs.dev)?
- Image result for why to use typescript
  In contrast to JavaScript, TypeScript code is more reliable and easier to refactor. This enables developers to evade errors and do rewrites much easier.

You can [view the entire source code here](https://github.com/leerob/youtube-to-mp3). Happy coding! ðŸ˜„

document.description: A fresh and minimal social media for Gen-Z

body.raw:
f we look back at the early days of social media, platforms such as Orkut and Facebook were used to connect with people online and forge stronger social relationships with friends, acquaintances and others. As social media evolved with applications like Instagram, Snapchat, and others, despite their specific focus, the core fundamentals remained the same â€” facilitating connections and networking.

However,visit [sunflower](https://sunflower-gold.vercel.app/home) with the advent of video-sharing platforms like TikTok, the social media landscape has undergone a sea change. This is because the emphasis of social media users has now broadened to consuming content, along with building connections.

<Image src={"/works/stories/ss2.png"} />

# Tech Stack

- nextjs
- prisma
- typescript
- tanstack-query
- shadcn/ui
- tailwindcss
- next-themes
